title: Manushi Chhillar to spread Covid-19 awareness
description: The beauty queen posted a video directed at the people of Haryana requesting them to stay at home to fight COVID-19 pandemic. She said, “We all know that coronavirus has pushed us to a state of immense crisis. And together we will need to fight it, we will ne…
content: With the county being in a lockdown phase till April 14, it is important for everyone to stay at home and break the chain of the spread of corona virus. Hence the Chief Minister of Haryana, Manohar Lal Khattar, has called upon Miss World 2017 Manushi Chhillar… [+131 chars]
